#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

//http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/ios/fixed/
//http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6735701/number-of-assignments-necessary-to-find-the-minimum-value-in-an-array

int main(){
	int t,n,i;
	double ans;
	cin>>t;
	cout.precision(3);
	while(t--){
		cin>>n;
		for(i=2,ans=1.0;i<=n;i++)
			ans+=1.0/i;
		cout<<fixed<<ans<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
